entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023
